attributes.action: Let the public vote on introducing the digital ID cards
attributes.additional_details: We live in a democracy and we should be allowed to vote on the matter, this will affect the public so the public should be alowed to vote.
attributes.background: We the public have spoken but the government refuses to listen. If the government insist on going ahead with the "digital ID cards" then we the public demand that the government give us the opportunity to vote on whether we want it or not

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Hold a referendum on introducing mandatory identity cards in the UK" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734246
